text:
If you use Apache 1.3 and the JK/AJP connector to connect to Tomcat then 
the first cookie gets lost when you login with form authentication in Tomcat 
4.1.7.

This results in rewrote links, i.e. http://somehost/a/b.gif;jsessionid=ituze23  
for images and same for all other links.

The browsers can't display images with these type of urls.

When you use Tomcat directly everything works fine.

This problem may occur also in later connectors?
creator: Udo.Walker@abas.de

text: You need to configure apache to accept requests with ";jsessionid".
creator: funkman@joedog.org
